full_text: Freshmen Orientation, August 12th at 9:00 am. WHS James McIlvaine Performing Arts Center. Members of the Class of 2026 only.  See you there, and Welcome to WHS!
Last Friday in July Grizzlies!  You know what that means......August baby!  First day of official practices, first day of school, and we are back in business!  See you on August 18th.
Team giving back to the community this morning after lifting! Then some donuts after some hard work! https://t.co/RcbzFTSk3J

Mrs. Sieber reminded me that we are 23 days away from the start of school.  Class of '23, are you ready for the official start of your senior year?  Class of '24, '25, and the newest class to WHS, 2026, are you ready to make this a great year as well? See you soon Grizzlies!

WHS Students and Parents!  This year we are going to move to a different platform for attendance.  We will be partnering with VisitU in an effort to make your experience with school attendance a more smooth and efficient process.  More information to follow! https://t.co/Mkk7siMnUq
Anthony Walker, #5 for the @Browns , speaking to the crowd at the Wadsworth Youth Football Scholarship Dinner.  Thank you for your great words of encouragement. https://t.co/fajv93kKaL
Cailey Piekarski and Mason Brugh were honored by the Wadsworth Youth Football Scholarship dinner.  Congratulations to you both and every person honored this evening. https://t.co/NX5tALhBcM

Some of the football players from WHS who are enjoying the Wadsworth Youth Football Annual Scholarship Dinner.   Congratulations to Cailey Piekarski and Mason Brugh tonight’s scholarship winners.  Finalists were Anthony Cirino, Brayden Griffin, and Conner Frisby and Ryan Polak. https://t.co/O2gBOPWZz6

Being recognized by former Wadsworth superintendent, Dr. Dale Fortner at the Wadsworth Youth Football Scholarship dinner.  Recipients were Conner Frisby, Brayden Griffin and Ryan Polak.  Anthony Cirino was not able to attend but was recognized as well. https://t.co/XlSCKktEWO

The boys arrived in Fargo! They are training today! Wrestling kicks off tomorrow for Dinwiddie, Kolt Mellon, Buckland, and Ries!

Your 2022 Fargo wrestlers from WHS.  Hunter Buckland, Kolt Mellon, Kade Mellon, Jaxon Joy, Jack Dinwiddie, Coen Grimm, and Aaron Ries.  Good luck Grizzlies!  You can watch the wrestling on FloWrestling! https://t.co/tJZsZMGyj4

Watching the British Open today while working.  150 year anniversary of this magnificent tournament.  Makes me think that just around the corner is the start of the Fall season for our sports teams!  Go Grizzlies!

Big man Sully Chadbourne making an impact knocking down the jumper, running the floor, and making the hustle play to extend the possession.  Excited to see you continue to progress your game this winter.   @SullyChadbourne @AauNextLevel https://t.co/s4UdXO2IEw

On Friday, June 3, contractors will be repairing the windows above our main entryway, in the children's area AV room. The exterior sliding doors will be temporarily shut down during repair work. Please enter and exit the building using the wheelchair accessible ramp and door. https://t.co/tgOrzUOo7z
